parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause the truck to shut off suddenly, without warning, while in motion, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The truck shuts off suddenly
without warning
while in motion
error codes SPN 1231 FMI 9 are displayed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure (Water Ingress and Leaks)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress and leaks can cause electrical system failures, leading to a range of issues, including shutting off the truck while in motion, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Water leaks into the electrical system
electrical lines are damaged
windshield leaks
city horn goes off and won't turn off
windshield wipers run at full speed
windshield washer fluid motor runs non-stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the defroster blower motor can cause reduced visibility, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The defroster blower motor stops working intermittently
throwing dash code SPN 523318 FMI 7
the motor quits working suddenly
the wiring harness melts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult to turn, making it challenging to maintain lane control, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The steering wheel is hard to turn
the vehicle has an unstable or swaying motion
the vehicle wanders over the center line or road edge
sudden shifts in the rear tandems
abnormal noises coming from underneath the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective brake pressure switch can cause the brake lights to malfunction, failing to warn following motorists, and can also lead to cruise control malfunction, causing the brakes to fight the engine, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake lights do not activate under normal driving conditions
brake lights only work on heavy pedal application
cruise control does not deactivate when applying the brakes
brakes fight the engine until the cruise control is manually turned off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake lock-up issue can cause the vehicle to lose control, increasing the risk of accidents, and can also lead to premature wear on the brakes and tires.
symptoms: Driver front tire locks up
brake pedal feels spongy or soft
uneven brake wear
tire wear on one side.
